name: Down Through Earth
description:
This is my first (and only) game I made called Down Through Earth. it is a small survival game where meteors fall from the sky and you need to survive, but as you evade the Meteors the ground falls apart. can you survive and make it to the center if the earth.

Side Note: I do realize that the game is a bit long and unforgiving, and I do want to fix that but as of now I lost the Unity File.
